Object.Name: 5GNR Connectivity
Object.Description1: This is a device management object that should be used for 5G-NR capable devices.

Item.Name: Connectivity Option
Item.Description: Indicates the connectivity option. 1 = Core Network: EPC; Master RAT: LTE; Secondary RAT: - 3 = Core Network: EPC; Master RAT: LTE; Secondary RAT: NR 2 = Core Network: 5GC; Master RAT: NR; Secondary RAT: - 4 = Core Network: 5GC; Master RAT: NR; Secondary RAT: eLTE 5 = Core Network: 5GC; Master RAT: eLTE; Secondary RAT: - 7 = Core Network: 5GC; Master RAT: eLTE; Secondary RAT: NR

Item.Name: NR Band Support available
Item.Description: Indicates the Operating NR Bands supported by UE in NSA mode. Value represents the integer value of band mentioned in 3GPP Spec 38.104 (Table: Table 5.2-1 and Table 5.2-2)

Item.Name: NR Band attached
Item.Description: Indicates the Operating NR Bands on which UE is attached. Value represents the integer value of band mentioned in 3GPP Spec 38.104 (Table: Table 5.2-1 and Table 5.2-2)

Item.Name: S-NSSAI
Item.Description: Indicates the Single - Network Slice Selection Assistance Information for 5G Standalone mode 0 = eMBB 1 = URLLC 2 = MIoT 3 = Custom 4-7 = Reserved

Item.Name: DNN Name
Item.Description: Data Network Name in case of Network Bearer Resource is a 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.

Item.Name: PDU Session Id
Item.Description: Indicates the PDU Session ID over which LwM2M session is established for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.

Item.Name: SSC Mode
Item.Description: Indicates the Session and Service Continuity mode for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.

Item.Name: PDU Session Type
Item.Description: Indicates the type of PDU session over which LwM2M connection is established for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 1 = IPv4 2 = IPv6 3 = IPv4v6 4 = Unstructured 5 = Ethernet 8 = Reserved (Spec Ref.)

Item.Name: 5QI
Item.Description: Indicates the 5G QoS Identifier for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 1-9,65,66,67,69,70,75,79,80,81,82,83,84,85 = Standard 128 to 254 = Operator specific 0,255 = Reserved Remaining = Spare (Spec Ref.)

Item.Name: SDAP Enablement
Item.Description: Indicates whether SDAP is enabled or not for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 0 = in UL only 1 = In DL Only 2 = In UL and DL both

Item.Name: QFI
Item.Description: Indicates the QoS Flow identifier for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. (Spec Ref.)

Item.Name: Session AMBR
Item.Description: Indicates the Session Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate as per the 5G 3GPP Spec for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. (Spec Ref.)

Item.Name: APN-AMBR
Item.Description: The Aggregate Maximum Bitrate which is applicable to a given APN over which LwM2M session is established for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.

Item.Name: NAS Reflective QOS
Item.Description: Indicates the QoS at NAS layer for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 0 = Disabled 1 = Enabled

Item.Name: Access Stratum Reflective QoS
Item.Description: Indicates the QoS for Access Stratum (RRC) for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.. 0 = Absent 1 = Present

Item.Name: P-CSCF Address Index
Item.Description: Index for the P-CSCF address for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network.

Item.Name: PDU session Authentication
Item.Description: Indicates the Authentication type for PDU Session PDU session Authentication 0 = Primary 1 = Secondary 2 = Both

Item.Name: PLMN ID
Item.Description: Indicates the PLMN ID over which UE is currently attached for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. Allows server to see the currennt PLMN in string format (e.g. formatted as result of AT+COPS=? as per 3GPP-TS_27.007)

Item.Name: LADN Support
Item.Description: Indicates whether LADN (Local Area Data Network) is supported or not for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 0 = Not Supported 1 = Supported

Item.Name: Integrity Protection on DRB
Item.Description: Current state of the Integrity Protection on Data Radio Bearer for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 0 = Disabled 1 = Enabled with 64-Kbps 2 = Enabled with Peak Rate

Item.Name: Access type Preference
Item.Description: Indicates the Access Type preference for 5G SA (FDD/TDD) Cellular Network. 0 = 3GPP 1 = Non-3GPP
